titles: The willow green turned into vvhite; or, The young man's joy and the maids delight. Being the maids kind and loving answer, to the distressed lovers complaint ... Tune is, My love sleeeps on another mans pillow. Or, The willow green, &c.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright and J. Clarke,
notes: Place and date range of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
